title: ➤Cozy 1 Bed in Brighton! H+HW Included! 9/1 Move-in!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 41323340', 'Rent: $2,200 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Updated 1 bedroom/1 bathroom in Brighton is now available to tour!', "Located by Packard's Corner, lots of restaurants and shops close by!", 'Close to public transit as well that will take you to Boston College, Boston University, and the center of Boston!', 'This unit features:', '- Hardwood floors', '- Spacious rooms', '- Updated kitchen and bath', '- Laundry in building', 'Heat and hot water included!', 'Pet friendly!', 'Available for a 9/1 move-in!', 'Please email Terry or respond to this ad to schedule a showing and get more info on this unit and other apartment options!', 'Email: Terry @ benjaminapartments .', 'com (Remove the spaces)', 'Search Boston’s largest selection of apartments at https://ygl.is/terry-zhu-agent', 'Nearby transportation:', 'Bus: 65 Washington St opp Euston Rd (0.31 mi)', 'Bus: 57 Cambridge St @ Saunders St (0.31 mi)', 'Bus: 501 Cambridge St @ Gordon St (0.32 mi)', 'Tram: B Warren Street (0.04 mi)', 'Bus: 64 N Beacon St @ Cambridge St (0.41 mi)', 'Bus: 66 Brighton Ave @ Cambridge St (0.42 mi)', 'FEATURES', 'Elevator', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
